name: GlamFit Workout Band
description:
Add this workout waist band to your glam workout routine. Say goodbye to those inches and fat cells. This band is sure to maximum compression and slims your waist by 2-3 inches to aid in weight loss. Whether you're walking the dog, going for a jog, or exercising add this to your active routine. The band wraps around the midsection adding compression in your core, while stimulating thermal activity and ramping up perspiration. The toxins and impurities will exit the skin, while mobilizing fat cells, sure to prove your workout is working for you. The band is made with a latex core featuring a soft cotton exterior and interior lining. It comes with level 1 and level 2 columns of hook closures to size the garment to your level of comfort. The flexi boning frames the cincher and prevents migration. You'll love our GlamFit band. 

 

*Please Note: Order your shirt size*

 

RESULTS

•Midsection control 

•Increased thermal activity

•Loss of inches reported

•Mobilizes fat cells 

•Stimulates perspiration 

 

FEATURES

•Latex workout band 

•Hook-and-eye closures 

•Flexi Boning 

•Cotton lining 

 

Materials: Linings: Cotton 96%, Spandex 4%, Core: Latex 100%

name: Waist Training Corset
description:
This underbust steel boned corset is practical, functional and will complete any outfit.  The corset is suitable for training of the waist but please seek medical advice before attempting this. Waist training corsets can be reduce your waist by 6"-7" if worn consistently. Please drink lots of water so that you will be hydrated when wearing corset throughout the day. Initially corset will be very tight as it does tight lace in the back. Once worn consistently corset will loosen a bit.

 Size guide:

1.Boned corsets are designed to be ordered 2 or 3 inches under your natural waist measurement. 

For example, if the measurement around the narrowest part of your relaxed waist is 30/31", you would typically order your corset in size 28" with semi lacing back open.

2.Corsets are designed to cinch the waist and lift the breasts. Lacing in the back allows the corset to be adjusted for comfort.

Corset Material:

14 Spiral Bones
Stainless Steel Busk Closure
100% Fine cotton twill Lining
Features Modesty Panel (Lining to Protect from String)
Strong Corset Cord Lacing
No trim
Potential Waist Reduction 3-6"
Color: black
Length: 10 1/2''
Fabric Description: Satin Polyester
Bust line: Under Bust

name: Long Corset
description:
Maximum waist loss inches with our Glam Diva long corset. Perfect for post-baby bodies and poochy bellies, while this waist cincher slims and trims and gives a boost to your bust. And when it comes to your back, our cincher has FlexiBoning that gently supports your spine, lengthening your torso to relieve pain as it slims your waist dramatically and immediately. By wearing this waist cincher for 8-10 hours a day for 30 days you are guarantee to see a reduction of 1-4 inches in the midsection. It comes with level 1 and level 2 hook support for your level of comfort. As you progress and get more comfortable with your corset you will advance to level 2 for a more compressed support. More importantly, you can wear this comfortably under any outfit and feel great while losing inches. Ready for that summer body? Going to the beach and need to fit in that cute two piece bathing suit? Or even that little black dress that you have been dying to wear. No more insecurities about that pudge that has been bothering you. Get rid of those fat cells wearing this waist cincher that mobilizes fat and toxins. Order your corset now to get maximized waist reduction and be the GlamDiva you are!

 

*Please Note: Order your shirt size*


Results
•Visible reduction of the waistline 
•Firmed midsection 
•Lifted bust 
•Reduced back pain 
•Boosts thermal activity 




Features
•Cincher design 
•Maximum compression shaping 
•FlexiBoning 
•Wear your own bra 
•PowerLatex construction 
•Front hook-and-eye closure 




Materials: 
Outer lining: 75% rubber covering, 25% cotton lining
